plot: When Chef Steve Lee loses his passion for his craft after his father's death, Sharon, an ordinary hawker, is hired to save the fledging cafe business. Sparks fly at first, but slowly, respect grows as they share their love for food.
plot_en: When Chef Steve Lee loses his passion for his craft after his father's death, Sharon, an ordinary hawker, is hired to save the fledging cafe business. Sparks fly at first, but slowly, respect grows as they share their love for food.
plot_es: When Chef Steve Lee loses his passion for his craft after his father's death, Sharon, an ordinary hawker, is hired to save the fledging cafe business. Sparks fly at first, but slowly, respect grows as they share their love for food.
title: Tiramisu
